name: Thumbnail for your Figma projects
description:
üìê Organize your Figma Dashboard!


Every project has a thumbnail that shows you a preview of the file's contet. Create your own simple thumbnail for your project.


You can set status of the project, add logo or icon and add short project description. Setting custom thumbnail is great way to quick recognize your projects.


If you have any questions you can contact me through instagram or twitter.


Have a great time organizing your figma dashboard! ü§ó
